amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for administrative expenses for the Federal Railroad Administration by $5,404,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds for administrative expenses for the Federal Railroad Administration by $5,404,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 230 (Roll no. 421).
